tokenGuide.title: How to get a GitHub Token
tokenGuide.step1: Go to GitHub Settings → Developer settings → Personal access tokens → Fine-grained tokens
tokenGuide.step3: Give it a name like "Activity Tracker"
tokenGuide.step4: Under "Account permissions", set Gists to "Read and write"
